channel.title: RSCD To-do List
channel.description: I don't suppose anyone here has a copy of the old RSCD To-do list?

item.title: RSCD To-do List
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

When a mithril seed was planted, a fake tree where you are standing that you could walk through. Pointless, but fun.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD To-do List
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Sceltor:

Sorry to go off topic Anarchist`, What are your plans once your creation is complete?

I’m not hosting a dedi, that’s for sure. Not worth the trouble or the stress. I’d just like to take up where Reines left off for a bit of fun, see if I can’t fully complete an RSC emulation with skills and features and quests etc.

[quote=“Motaro, post:7, topic:224267”]Gee, I think Reines covered most of RSC himself.

Some spells were left undone, like iban blast, god spells, and all of the weakening spells.

I remember runecrafting being on the to-do list, and you made it!

You know what would be really impressive? Implementing the dwarf cannon!

Oh yeah, and mithril seeds that plant fake trees![/quote]

Yeah, he made a bloody good effort, that’s for sure. Spells are fairly easy since the base is fully coded already, runecrafting could use a lot of fine tuning and some more custom items like tiaras and talismans (whatever the fuck they’re for) and whatnot, the dwarf cannon would be interesting to code and the mithril seeds would be pretty easy. I’m guessing they’d just be a case of “on(item drop) { addObject(tree); addDelayedObjectRemover(tree); }”, like player-created fires.

I was never a big p2p player, how did the seeds work? Did you just drop them and it spawned a temporary tree? What was the point of the seeds :S?

I guess a big portion of the content left to be added to RSCD was quest-reliant (iban, dwarf cannon, god spells etc. etc.).

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD To-do List

item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

Gee, I think Reines covered most of RSC himself.

Some spells were left undone, like iban blast, god spells, and all of the weakening spells.

I remember runecrafting being on the to-do list, and you made it!

You know what would be really impressive? Implementing the dwarf cannon!

Oh yeah, and mithril seeds that plant fake trees!
